channel.title: Recipes on Matthew Peyton

item.title: Baked Honey Granola
item.description: Baked Honey Granola Ingredients 2 Cups uncooked rolled oats Quarter cup brown sugar (or regular sugar) Do an eigth of a cup for less sweet granola Quarter teaspoon cinnamon Quarter cup of honey Quarter cup of olive oil Pinch of salt (Optional) Any dried mixins (e.g. dried fruit) Instructions Preheat oven to 325 degrees In large bowl, combine oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, salt In a glass measuring cup, add honey, and warm in microwave for 30 seconds Add the olive oil to the honey and stir to mix Drizzle the honey+olive oil over the ingredients.
